name: BOOMBIT 5 The Last Adventure
description: BOOMBIT 5 The Last Adventure - is a pixel platformer with bosses and story.This is the last installment in the BOOMBIT series, which also ties in with CUBIXJUMP. In this game you will have to kill bosses, upgrade your character, and go through interesting levels. And all this with a plot. So far I have done 1 chapter and it will be free!
